content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Complex at (-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15, -50) connected to wooden chest at (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace at (-14, -47) that processes iron ore into plates

### Iron Plate Production Area at (0, 0) to (6, 4)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces at (0,0), (4,4), and (6,4) processing iron ore into plates

### Copper Plate Production at (2, 0)
- Stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates

### Automation Science Pack Factory at (24.5, 4.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (24.5, 4.5)
- Input wooden chest at (21.5, 4.5) containing iron plates
- Output wooden chest at (27.5, 4.5) containing automation science packs
- Two burner inserters at (22.5, 4.5) and (26.5, 4.5) moving materials

### Research Lab Complex at (11.5-21.5, 15.5)
Multiple labs connected to power network for research

### Power Generation System
- Steam engine at (9.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at (-2.0, 23.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected via pipe networks (fluid systems 51087 and 51089)
- Electric pole network connecting various structures (id 127827)

ERROR TIPS

### Research Related Errors
- Cannot research already completed technologies (Electronics)
- Cannot research technologies without completing prerequisites (Automation-2 requires Steel Processing)

### Entity Connection Errors
- Failed to connect pipes between boiler and steam engine - ensure proper pipe layout and connections

### Resource/Fuel Management
- Ensure sufficient coal supply for burner devices (mining drills, inserters, boilers)
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to prevent "out of fuel" warnings

### Crafting Errors
- Verify required ingredients are available before attempting to craft items (iron gear wheel crafting failed)

### Entity Interaction Errors
- Some labs are not receiving power - check electrical connections
- Steam engine not connected to power network - verify electrical pole connections
- Boiler showing no fuel status - maintain fuel supply
